title: 2000/169/EC: Council Decision of 25 February 2000 extending Decision 91/482/EEC on the association of the overseas countries and territories with the European Economic Communit
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 25 February 2000
extending Decision 91/482/EEC on the association of the overseas countries and territories with the European Economic Community
(2000/169/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Decision 91/482/EEC(1), and in particular Article 240(4), second subparagraph thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,
Whereas, pending the entry into force of a new Council Decision on the association of the overseas countries and territories with the European Community, the applicable provisions under Decision 91/482/EEC should be extended until the entry into force of the new Decision, but not beyond 28 February 2001,
main_body:
Article 240(1) of Decision 91/482/EEC is hereby replaced by the following:
"1. This Decision shall apply until 28 February 2001."

This Decision shall take effect on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 29 February 2000.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 February 2000.
For the Council
The President
J. GAMA
(1) OJ L 263, 19.9.1991, p. 1. Decision as last amended by Decision 97/803/EC (OJ L 329, 29.11.1997, p. 50).
